          <title>
            <string language="es">Rocas magmáticas</string>
            <string language="en">Magmatic rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magmatic Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roches magmatiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rochas magmatic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roccie magmatic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγματικοί βράχοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se desglosan las rocas en magmáticas, sedimentarias y metamórficas. La página siguiente trata las rocas magmáticas.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic breaking down rocks into magmatic, sedimentary and metamorphic. The following page deals with magmatic rocks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Rocas magmáticas</string>
            <string language="en">Magmatic rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das hinunter Felsen in magmatic, in 
sedimentäres und in metamorphes bricht. Die folgende Seite 
beschäftigt magmatic Felsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décomposant des roches en magmatique, 
sédimentaire et métamorphique. La page suivante traite les 
roches magmatiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que quebra abaixo rochas em magmatic, em 
sedimentary e em metamorphic. A seguinte página trata das 
rochas magmatic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che analizza le roccie in magmatic, in 
sedimentario ed in metamorfico. La seguente pagina si occupa 
delle roccie magmatic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που χωρίζει τους βράχους σε μαγματικός, 
ιζηματώδης και μεταμορφικός. Η ακόλουθη σελίδα εξετάζει 
τους μαγματικούς βράχους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
